## Install

## api

### .readFile( filepath )

Read files asynchronously.

```js
var file = require('read-file');
file.readFileSync('foo.txt');
```

### .readFileSync( filepath )

Read files synchronously.

```js
var file = require('read-file');
file.readFile('foo.txt', callback);
```
